author: emhane
content: Will only validators be storing samples? That would make this so much easier in sense of guaranteed availability as CL has a mechanism for offline penalties. On the down side it would mean more traffic targeted at validators and maybe especially at certain time points more traffic (like shortly after a sample is committed).

author: emhane
content: In that case what would be the strategy to re-locate the content a validator stores if it wants to cash out and exit?
